column1: Uchi////Now the reason why this trip upset me was because it was our anniversary. We expected to love every dish
column3: but after every dish we were like "ehh" nothing was great
column4: and the dessert was just bad for us. If this was any other place I wouldn't be so disappointed
column5: but it's Uchi . We spent a lot of money on a mediocre meal. Left feeling like we were robbed. The only reason I give it 2 stars is because the plates looked beautiful and service was nice.
